filters.label: text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700
filters.select: px-3 py-2 text-sm border border-neutral-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 bg-white min-w-32
filters.button: px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 bg-white border border-neutral-300 rounded-md hover:bg-neutral-50 transition-colors duration-200

sort.label: text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700
sort.select: px-3 py-2 text-sm border border-neutral-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 bg-white

list.item: flex items-center space-x-4 p-4 bg-white border border-neutral-200 rounded-lg hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

image.container: w-20 h-20 bg-neutral-100 rounded-md overflow-hidden flex-shrink-0

actions.button: px-3 py-1.5 text-xs font-medium text-primary-600 bg-primary-50 rounded-md hover:bg-primary-100 transition-colors duration-200

pagination.item: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 bg-white border border-neutral-300 rounded-md hover:bg-neutral-50 hover:text-primary-600 transition-colors duration-200
pagination.prev: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 bg-white border border-neutral-300 rounded-l-md hover:bg-neutral-50
pagination.next: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 bg-white border border-neutral-300 rounded-r-md hover:bg-neutral-50

empty.title: text-lg font-medium text-neutral-900 mb-2
empty.button: inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-white bg-primary-600 rounded-md hover:bg-primary-700 transition-colors duration-200

loading.container: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6
loading.title: h-4 bg-neutral-200 rounded animate-pulse
